title: DMP arrests 392 in 24 hours during operation Devil Hunt Phase-2
body: DC Talebur Rahman said the operation was conducted to support ongoing efforts to maintain normal law and order in the capital Dhaka Metropolitan Police arrested 392 people in 24 hours under Operation Devil Hunt Phase-2 from 1am to 11.59pm on Tuesday at various locations in the capital. Among those arrested were 15 active leaders and activists of the Awami League and its affiliated organisations, along with 377 individuals wanted in various cases or held on existing warrants with warrants, said Talebur Rahman, deputy commissioner (Media) of DMP. The operation was carried out as part of the ongoing efforts to maintain normal law and order in the capital.
